name: Run For Your Gems
description:
Started doing a Platformer for fun and learning. Ended with like an hour of content with Speedruns, collecting and some eastereggs!.

If you find a bug or you own any of the assets and want to be in the credits (or want to get it removed :(, tell me)

All Sprites, Sounds and Music are from itch.io, I don't own any of those.

Sprites by Ansimuz.
